entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this morning. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this evening and after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
